posts.postText: It gets so damn annoying to be freetranqed and not knowing which guard did it due to their RP names. Prisoners should only have the RP names to conceal their identity, not the guards
Even though i hardly play on the jailbreak server, i agree.
that would be a Great thing. because that way we can find the free-tranqers.
I say keep the RP names and make damage logs.  I don't want RP names to go away.
it was just for guards is what they meant, i think. but mag has a good point as well, that way we can just ban the free tranqers.
They should keep other wise it would be easier for the police to free kill all but his buds cuz his buddy could say in chat he jumping or something so he doesnt kill him in the process.
its for the guards, but keep it for prisoners
